physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple verruca-like nodules on the dorsal surface of hands and feet, multiple pitted keratoses on palms and soles, papillomatosis of the oral cavity.
Multinodular goiter noted in the father and both daughters.
Histological findings included follicular hamartoma, verrucous acanthomas, or nonspecific benign fibroma.
Presence of a point mutation in the 39 splice site of intron 6 (IVS6-1 G [C]) confirmed in the father and two daughters.
